verses.verse: I will stand <WH5975> upon my watch <WH4931>, and set <WH3320> me upon the tower <WH4692>, and will look <WH7200> forth to see <WH7200> what he will speak <WH1696> with me <WH7725>, and what I shall answer concerning my complaint <WH8433>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> answered <WH6030> me <WH559>, and said, Write <WH3789> the vision <WH2377>, and make it plain <WH874> upon tablets <WH3871>, that he may run <WH7323> that readeth it <WH7121>.

For the vision <WH2377> is yet for the appointed time <WH4150>, and it hasteth toward the end <WH7093>, and shall <WH6315> not lie <WH3576>: though it tarry <WH4102>, wait <WH2442> for it <WH935>; because it will surely come <WH935>, it will not delay <WH309>.
Behold <WH5315>, his soul is puffed up <WH6075>, it is not upright <WH3474> in him <WH6662>; but the righteous shall live <WH2421> by his faith <WH530>.

Yea <WH3196>, moreover, wine is treacherous <WH898>, a haughty <WH3093> man <WH1397>, that keepeth not at home <WH5115>; who enlargeth <WH7337> his desire <WH5315> as Sheol <WH7585>, and he is as death <WH4194>, and cannot be satisfied <WH7646>, but gathereth <WH622> unto him all nations <WH1471>, and heapeth <WH6908> unto him all peoples <WH5971>.

Shall not all these take up <WH5375> a parable <WH4912> against him <WH4426>, and a taunting proverb <WH2420> against him <WH559>, and say, Woe <WH1945> to him that increaseth <WH7235> that which is not his <WH3513>! how long? and that ladeth himself with pledges <WH5671>!
Shall they not rise up <WH6965> suddenly <WH6621> that shall bite <WH5391> thee <WH3364>, and awake that shall vex <WH2111> thee <WH4933>, and thou shalt be for booty unto them?

Because thou hast plundered <WH7997> many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, all the remnant <WH3499> of the peoples <WH5971> shall plunder <WH7997> thee <WH120>, because of men's blood <WH1818>, and for the violence <WH2555> done to the land <WH776>, to the city <WH7151> and to all that dwell therein <WH3427>.

Woe <WH1945> to him that getteth <WH1214> an evil <WH7451> gain <WH1215> for his house <WH1004>, that he may set <WH7760> his nest <WH7064> on high <WH4791>, that he may be delivered <WH5337> from the hand <WH3709> of evil <WH7451>!
Thou hast devised <WH3289> shame <WH1322> to thy house <WH1004>, by cutting off <WH7096> many <WH7227> peoples <WH5971>, and hast sinned <WH2398> against thy soul <WH5315>.
For the stone <WH68> shall cry out <WH2199> of the wall <WH7023>, and the beam out <WH3714> of the timber <WH6086> shall answer it <WH6030>.
Woe <WH1945> to him that buildeth <WH1129> a town <WH5892> with blood <WH1818>, and establisheth <WH3559> a city <WH7151> by iniquity <WH5766>!

Behold <WH3068>, is it not of Jehovah of hosts <WH6635> that the peoples <WH5971> labor <WH3021> for the <WH1767> fire <WH784>, and the nations <WH3816> weary <WH3286> themselves for <WH1767> vanity <WH7385>?
For the earth <WH776> shall be filled <WH4390> with the knowledge <WH3045> of the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068>, as the waters <WH4325> cover <WH3680> the sea <WH3220>.

Woe <WH1945> unto him that giveth his neighbor <WH7453> drink <WH8248>, to thee that addest <WH5596> thy venom <WH2573>, and makest him drunken <WH7937> also <WH5027>, that thou mayest look on their nakedness <WH4589>!

Thou art filled <WH7646> with shame <WH7036>, and not glory <WH3519>: drink <WH8354> thou also <WH6188>, and be as one uncircumcised; the cup <WH3563> of Jehovah <WH3068>'s right hand <WH3225> shall come round <WH5437> unto thee <WH7022>, and foul shame shall be upon thy glory <WH3519>.

For the violence <WH2555> done to Lebanon <WH3844> shall cover <WH3680> thee <WH7701>, and the destruction of the beasts <WH929>, which made them afraid <WH2865>; because of men <WH120>'s blood <WH1818>, and for the violence <WH2555> done to the land <WH776>, to the city <WH7151> and to all that dwell therein <WH3427>.

What profiteth <WH3276> the graven image <WH6459>, that the maker <WH3335> thereof hath graven <WH6458> it <WH4541>; the molten image, even the teacher <WH3384> of lies <WH8267>, that he that fashioneth <WH3335> its form <WH3336> trusteth <WH982> therein <WH6213>, to make dumb <WH483> idols <WH457>?

Woe <WH1945> unto him that saith <WH559> to the wood <WH6086>, Awake <WH6974>; to the dumb <WH1748> stone <WH68>, Arise <WH5782>! Shall this teach <WH3384>? Behold <WH8610>, it is overlaid with gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701>, and there is no breath <WH7307> at all in the midst of it <WH7130>.
But Jehovah <WH3068> is in his holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>: let all the earth <WH776> keep silence <WH2013> before him <WH6440>.
